CustomField.description: This must be an exact match for an activity category (for time entries) or expense category (for expenses) in Clio or a new one will be created. It can be left blank. Note: Leave this field blank if your firm uses UTBMS codes and the row contains values for utbms_activity_code and utbms_task_code. Otherwise, a validation error will occur for the row.
CustomField.label: Expense Category
